devdoc.author: Origin Protocol Inc

returns.eth: The amount of execution rewards that were sent to the Native Staking Strategy

params._strategy: Address of the Native Staking Strategy

devdoc.title: Fee Accumulator for Native Staking SSV Strategy

STRATEGY().notice: The address of the Native Staking Strategy

collect().notice: sends all ETH in this FeeAccumulator contract to the Native Staking Strategy.

userdoc.notice: Receives execution rewards which includes tx fees and MEV rewards like tx priority and tx ordering. It does NOT include swept ETH from beacon chain consensus rewards or full validator withdrawals.
